price: Reci: "Skrivali vi ono što je u prsima vašim ili pokazivali, Allah to zna. On zna sve što je na nebesima i što je na Zemlji. Allah nad svime ima moć!"
arabic: قُلۡ إِن تُخۡفُواْ مَا فِي صُدُورِكُمۡ أَوۡ تُبۡدُوهُ يَعۡلَمۡهُ ٱللَّهُۗ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul in tukh'fū mā fī ṣudūrikum aw tub'dūhu yaʿlamhu al-lahu wayaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
